lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I find their stories amazing!  These are very hard working people who are just trying to make a living and support their family.  Our donations are a way to help them out of poverty.  We have so much here in the States, and they have so little.  A little goes a long way for them, and it is the least we can do to help them succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage multi family community associations (i.e. condominium/townhome associations, single family associations, commercial properties).  I manage the maintenance of both the buildings and the property.

lenders.name: Tete a Pratt

lenders.name: HelpHer
lenders.loan_because: The HelpHer Giving Circle is a group of women who come together monthly and pool our monies, both individually committed dollars and our fundraising contributions.  We are especially sensitive to help when community resources/services are unable to meet women's needs.  We give anonymously, quickly, and with no strings attached.
lenders.occupational_info: Monies collected within the HelpHer Giving Circle are designated for three areas of giving: women within the metro area of Nebraska/Iowa, international women through Kiva.org, and emergency funds for basic needs and legal services.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a revolutionary concept that offers a tangible solution to eliminating, or at least drastically reducing world poverty. So for that, thank you!!!

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I made a loan in my mother and mother-in-laws' names.  When the loans are paid back I will reinvest the money in 2 more woman.  This way, the lives of the 2 women who were so important in my life will go on forever helping other women around the world.

lenders.name: Mark & Jenn Gonnelly

lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding, enriching, and challenging

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: We have always believed in the spirit of the entrepreneur and small business owner.
lenders.occupational_info: We help local business owners promote their business online.

lenders.name: Eric & Christine
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Kiva seems like a good way to help out individual people instead of sending it into a vague pool of money where it might or might not get to the people you want it to go to. I really like this concept and you can follow the progress of the people you help out and if successful really makes everyone feel like they've accomplished something. Not many things in life do that.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lenders.name: jeanene
lenders.loan_because: My friends and I have been blessed.  We are all mothers and daughters who understand the desire of a better life for our families. This is my 50th birthday gift from my friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student again at 50.  I have gone back to school to get a Masters Degree to help people.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that these hard working people are not asking for a handout, but rather a helping hand. Thanks Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell annuities to financial professionals in the United States. Annuities are insurance products that provide people guaranteed income in their retirement years.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in our local hospital.  I am a mother of two military sons  who are both married and I  have a great husband.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's a nice feeling to be able to make such a big difference with even small loans, and to feel connected with people on the other parts of the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise awareness and support for important issues and causes.

lenders.name: Jim and Deb
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: Banker (Jim) and Director of Operations (Deb)

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to give.  I am very grateful for the abundance I have in my life.  Not everybody has the access to food, shelter, clothing, and education that I have.  I hope my loans help others to exceed where they could not before.  Best of luck and lots of love!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently teaching conversational English in Japan.

lenders.name: Team D
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help entrepreneurs achieve their goals of starting or expanding their businesses.  We really believe in the concept of micro-lending and wanted to support it.  This idea started as part of a group project for one of our classes.
lenders.occupational_info: Our team - comprised of 4 members - works in various fields such as health care and financial services.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I almost cried when I saw the Kiva segment on CNN...  I have more than I deserve.  These people work harder than I, and can hardly feed their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Land Developer in Southwest Florida ( I sell homes in gated communities).  I spend all of my free time competing and training as a Triathlete.

lenders.name: William Hite
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping hard working people and their families climb out of poverty and helping them realize some of their dreams.  I am fortunate to be an American, and would like to share some of my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: To help
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university, helping environmental scientists manage and spend their grant funds.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I can. Why would I not?

lenders.name: Gracie
lenders.loan_because: I love the feeling I get in my stomach when I give back to someone. Giving is the best present anyone can ever get.

lenders.name: Scott and Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: it is such a wonderful opportunity to share in personal growth of people all over the world.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help at some time in their life.  It gives me great pleasure to be able to help--even though the amount may be small.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for many doctors, helping them by writing letters, making appointments, and arranging tests for their patients.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a little leg-up, and hard work can result in success and a great sense of accomplishment. Everyone deserves the opportunity to better themselves and their community.

lenders.name: Joao
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way I can help those with great needs
lenders.occupational_info: help physicians treat patients with heart disease

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: I spent 6 months volunteering in Ecuador and traveled in Peru for two weeks.  I feel this is a great way to continue helping people in South America get ahead in life.

lenders.name: Eleni
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Mikkel Breum
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro-financing can be much better than traditional aid, as it recognizes the receivers as people with pride and motivation, instead of as clients and beggars. Just like you would normally lend your colleagues or neighbor instead of giving; for just the same reason. Another important issue for me is, that this way the money is  distributed through grassroots organizations, so its harder for corrupt people in power to steal it from the people it was intended for (at least I'd like to think so). Finally I believe, that people committing and doing something instead of just talking about it, is the only way for this world to ever get better.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help others in a personal meaningful way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a consultant for the insurance industry.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: talk type talk type talk type

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: it's a phenomenal way to get money to the people who need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with electric companies to help keep the lights on!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Ican.
lenders.occupational_info: Pretending

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the fact that these people are willing to do what it takes to better their lives and those of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: General bookkeeping and income tax preparation. Also sell on Ebay.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to me and I in turn want to give back.  That's what its all about.  I thank my neice for letting me know about Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a hospital lab. We help the Doctor find out what germ is making you sick and what medication will help make you 
well. After 32 yrs I have retied and moved to Michigan.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: it is a joy to help someone improve their life

lenders.name: Many Blessings
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate, the least we can do is help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse, married to a veterinarian.  We have four kids and numerous critters.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it's an easy way to make a big difference. I especially find it important to support women who are trying to start or expand their businesses because it allows them to be self-reliant.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I'm lending this money to derserving people in the name of my grandchildren. Tanner, Jared, Harlie and Brooke, as an extra Hanukkah gift, in hopes it will teach them the value of charity and the thrill that comes from helping other families in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm best known for the miniature animals I create out of clay, paint, fake fur and/or feathers. They are in private collections and museums. I built this home based business by myself  over 30 years ago.

lenders.name: victoria
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help hospitals reduce cost and improve clinical outcomes.

lenders.name: giandomenico
lenders.loan_because: i have the possibility and i trust in microcredit as a way for a better world

lenders.name: The Skelton Family
lenders.loan_because: As a family this year we are making donations instead of exchanging christmas gifts.  We hope to spread our gifts around the world this year!

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.occupation: Program Director for a public policy nonprofit

lenders.name: Forrest
lenders.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish and he is fed for a day, teach a man to fish and he is fed for a lifetime, provide credit and training, he opens a seafood stand and feeds a village."

“The significant problems we have cannot be solved at the same level of thinking with which we created them.”  -  Albert Einstein
lenders.occupational_info: I am a construction engineer working wherever the world takes me.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I get to volunteer to various things, working for food pantries, building homes with Habitat for Humanity, etc.

lenders.name: Roger & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We are thankful to be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info:
I build & repair the interiors of  boats.
My wife works in a large office building and using a computer helps companys with their employee's health plans.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I build and repair boats.  I am mostly retired now.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I believe the establishment sometimes makes it hard for some to take their first steps towards success.
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure employees of large companies are able to get information about their retirement and healthcare benefits

lenders.name: Antonio & Giancarlo
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of humanity and my son and I want to help others, even if we do not know them personally.
lenders.occupational_info:
"The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity." - Tolstoy

May you succeed in your businesses and prosper.  My son and I are honored to be of service to you.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: I feel a moral resposibility to help others in need.

lenders.name: Ludovic Trautmann
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I learn people how to learn.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with designing and manufacturing satellite products.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Better than charity.

lenders.name: The Bush Family
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Dale & Callie
lenders.loan_because: We want to help spread our good fortune

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I would love to help others as others have helped me in a time of need.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a supervisor for a Hi Tech company 'Sagem Morpho Inc."  which does livescan fingerprinting for background checks.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the medically underserved.

lenders.name: Elin & René
lenders.loan_because: We are aware of the problems related to dead capital, and find that micro-loans like the ones Kiva administrate are very useful when it comes to help people in the third world becoming economical active.
lenders.occupational_info: Elin works in an insurance company and René is working in a office that administrate both temporary and permanent jobs.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want women all over the world to have the same opportunities I've had in developing a career and business
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their kitchens and bathrooms, so they can enjoy their homes even more than they already do.

lenders.name: Pruski-Clawson Family
lenders.loan_because: we have such great
lenders.occupational_info: Our family has diverse occupations:  salesmen, attorney, homemaker, retired, school children

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I know how much a loan means to an Entrepreneur. I feel as though I can truly help those with passion in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small manufacturing company in San Francisco, CA that employs 35 people

lenders.name: Aussie School Friends
lenders.loan_because: We feel connected to a common purpose, even though we now live all over the world.

lenders.name: Mark Henry
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I make wine

lenders.name: Tom & Lynn
lenders.loan_because: l believe the type of micro loans provided through agencies like Kiva are the most effective means of encouraging economic development at the grass roots level.  The success of individual entrepreneurs has a ripple effect in that it can inspire others to pursue their economic goals.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: It's good!

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: this is the best medium to have a direct impact on one entrepreneur, his/her family, his/her town and the greater world...
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own insurance company in 2003.

lenders.name: Susan & Bud
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together...  It's one of our ways to reach out from a small town in SW Michigan to help others...

lenders.name: S. Kent
lenders.loan_because: When I'm thinking about buying something I really don't *have* to have or going out to a nice lunch when I have food at home that's perfectly good, I come home and come here occasionally ... and feel much better knowing that money is going to something that really is necessary.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to help the best healthcare products get out to the public faster

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get the funds necessary to start or run a small business.  I also loan money because I believe in helping others, that is what I was taught to do... you never know when it might be you in need....
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer technician who believed in myself so much that I started a small business of my own doing on-site computer services for private clients and small businesses. I fix computers, build them and service them in many different ways. I LOVE what I do and love helping others, that is why I do it.

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I are always looking for ways to help others improve their quality of life. Thank you KIVA for your innovative thinking and an easy-to-use website!

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that need money for their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I got to school to learn all that I can learn.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: alex
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an electrical engineer.  The company I work for specializes in making movable parts of buildings

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I have worked with microfinance projects in Africa and have witnessed first hand the difference that each dollar can make.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work hard to improve themselves, help their families, and learn to help others.  Our world is one large community, and all the world's people are members of my community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from formal work, but I do some substitute teaching, I enjoy gardening, and I work with wood to make toys and other small items to give as gifts.

lenders.name: Godfrey
lenders.occupation: Ex Pro Soccer Player / Venture Capital Partner
lenders.loan_because: For each Kiva entrepreneur, the fruits of their success are likely to be spent in their own community which in turn will continue to benefit that community. How cool is that!
lenders.occupational_info: I used to kick a soccer ball around for a living, now I help fund businesses.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the poor
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very interesting.I get to meet travellers from all acrooss the world and hear different stories of their cultures.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: A simple act can change a life, and life changed can change the world.

lenders.name: Rob, Tami, and Nate
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are called to share what has been given to us.

lenders.name: Piam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I  can
lenders.occupational_info: one that is In progress - still

lenders.name: Rosa
lenders.loan_because: I want to give more to people less fortunate.  I work for the US Navy overseas and witnessed how poverty strictened these people really are. I'm not rich, but I know I don't need $25.00.
lenders.occupational_info: I allow people to talk to each other through a T.V.  I'm a Video Teleconference Technician.  I just engineered a teleconference that our own US President Bush conducted.  I was given a Letter of Appreciation for making sure the video conference went flawless:)

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: Our family would like to help others around the world who are trying to make their dreams come true!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner of a consulting firm.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what God has blessed me with.  I also want others to succeed - one person, one life at a time...maybe, just maybe, we can help.  Let's change this world for the better and be a more God worthy people.

lenders.name: Liam and Aidan
lenders.loan_because: People around the world need help and we feel that is our responsibility to help them.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It a good feeling to help others run a small business and keep it growing.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy learning about people worldwide and contributing to their success

lenders.name: kera
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need and I want to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my kids and volunteer in school.

lenders.name: dkd
lenders.loan_because: Because I try to live by Gandhi's mantra, "Be the change you wish to see in the World." & Bono's "It's not charity; It's justice."

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to and the knowledge and conscience  to understand that I can make a difference in someone else's life
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to gain the health care skills in school that I will be able to utilize for those who don't have access to adequate health care
